_sText:
Well, i alway's enjoyed playing the orignal map so i decided to fix some of the old problems, and add some new feature's.

you can no longer fall off the map.

you no longer get stuck in S4S, (added a button inside.)

the t spawn door now opens with no problem's.

i've changed the ct spawn around a little bit also.

there's a new rebel's tunnel so you dont have to camp the red room.

that's about it. let me know what you guy's think.

(this is my first edit/map)
